content:
## Learning roles
- 🧑‍🎓 <@&469239964119597056>
  if you'd like to be notified about exercises or lessons!
- <:omega:486886779941683211> <@&649313942002466826>
  if you'd like to be notified about new words!
- 🤗 <@&683443550410506273>
  if you'd like to take part in some events we host from time to time!
- 🗺️ <@&637359870009409576>
  if you'd like to be notified about interesting stuff we find regarding Greek dialects!
- 📑 <@&800464173385515058>
  if you'd like to be notified about reading linguistics papers relating to Greek (dialects or standard) with <@189036489265381387>
